# AI Timeline Widget

Embeddable widget for displaying AI Timeline updates on external sites.

## Quick Start

Add this iframe to your HTML:

```html
<iframe 
  src="https://ai-timeline-omega.vercel.app/widget.html"
  width="400"
  height="400"
  frameborder="0"
  style="border: 1px solid #e5e2dc; border-radius: 12px;"
  title="AI Timeline Widget"
></iframe>
```

## Customization

### Size
Adjust `width` and `height` attributes:
- Minimum: 300px width
- Recommended: 400x400px

### Dark Mode
The widget automatically detects the user's system preference using `prefers-color-scheme`.

### Direct Link
Link to the full timeline:
```html
<a href="https://ai-timeline-omega.vercel.app" target="_blank">
  View AI Timeline →
</a>
```

## Features

- ✅ Shows latest 3 AI updates
- ✅ Auto-refreshes every 30 minutes
- ✅ Responsive design
- ✅ Dark mode support
- ✅ Click-through to full timeline
- ✅ Zero dependencies

## Example

See it in action: [Widget Demo](https://ai-timeline-omega.vercel.app/widget.html)
